about_the_game:
Step into the boots of a battle-hardened soldier in Last Stand: WWII, a gripping 2.5D roguelike action-adventure game that plunges you into the chaos of World War II. Command a squad of elite troopers as you face relentless waves of enemy forces, striving to survive until the clock runs out.

In this high-stakes survival game, strategy and quick reflexes are paramount. Utilize a diverse arsenal of support and assault cards to bolster your squad’s capabilities and adapt to the ever-changing battlefield. Whether it's enhancing your firepower, fortifying your defenses, or calling in vital support, each card can turn the tide in your favor.

Features:

Intense Roguelike Gameplay: Experience the thrill of permadeath and procedural generation, ensuring each playthrough is unique and challenging.

2.5D Visuals: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world that combines 2D characters with beautifully rendered 3D environments.

WWII Themed Combat: Engage in authentic World War II battles with historically inspired weaponry and scenarios.

Squad-Based Strategy: Command up to three troopers, each with unique abilities and roles, to create the ultimate fighting force.

Dynamic Card System: Collect and deploy support and assault cards that can enhance your squad’s abilities, provide powerful weapons, or offer strategic advantages.

Wave Survival Mode: Face off against relentless waves of enemies, each more challenging than the last, in a bid to survive until time runs out.

Prepare yourself for a relentless fight where every decision counts. Will you and your troopers hold the line and turn the tide of war? The battlefield awaits your command in Last Stand: WWII.

Get ready for action. Survive the onslaught. Make your stand.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
